title: Build My Own Redis
tagline: An in-memory data store implementing RESP, persistence, and clustering.
description: Recreating Redis core features to learn protocol design, event loops, persistence, and replication.
problem: How does Redis achieve low-latency operations, persistence, and replication across nodes?
features: RESP protocol server with basic commands (GET, SET, DEL, INCR, EXPIRE)

frontend: CLI client + minimal Next.js admin UI

architecture.description: Event loop, command handlers, persistence, replication, and clustering.

challenges: Efficient AOF handling without latency spikes
contributions: Protocol server, persistence, replication, and admin UI
